name: Other Reality - Life Simulator
description:
Other Reality is a life simulator in which you have to play as a girl or a guy.

Do you want to plunge into another world full of adventures and unexpected moments? You are waiting for beautiful clothes, sports cars, luxury houses and apartments in an elite area, popularity with the opposite sex, as well as...
FEATURES:
- Upgrade your character to your liking
- Buy cool things
- Meet and go on dates
- Develop relationships and fall in love
- Freely move around the city, which has dozens of interesting places, using the metro, taxi or car
- Get the job of your dreams, starting from the bottom and ending with a Director or world-class actor.
- Buy apartments and luxury homes, and then make them cool things
- Purchase a dream car fleet
- To acquire and develop the company
- Follow the results in Forbes
- Develop by reading books and courses
- Cook yourself, order food or eat in cafes, restaurants
- And many other possibilities...
